description: Introducing the lastest Slim Premium Litchi Grain Multifunction Leather Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 Case from Acase Products line- A must-have for your Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1! The Acase multifunction Litchi Grain leather case for Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 is perfect for daily usages and travels! The exterior of this case is made of litchi grain leather, which is light-weight and can provide the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 a total protection from scratches and small impacts.This thinness of this case gives your Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 a snug fit without adding any bulk to it, which is a great match with the slender design of the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1.The microfiber inlay gently protects the backside and the screen of the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 from scratches, and there would be no residues falling on to the screen of the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1. The grooves on the microfiber part of the case offer the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 multi viewing angles, now you are able to type an email or watch a movie without holding the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 on hands. The last angle of the standing position is used to provide another viewing option for the user. This position is not suitable for typing on the device. Please use typing the position for typewritingYou can still access all of the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1's features even while it's still installed in this case including charging! You can put your Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 into any other bag or case without having to worry about not fitting! The choice solution in Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 mobile protection!Compatible with the Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 Wi-Fi / 3G 4G LTE, 2011 ModelTry it - from the best Tablet PC Case manufacture to add additional protector to your newest Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 Wi-Fi / 3G 4G LTE
title: Acase Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 P7500 High Quality Premium Slim Leather Case Folio with built-in Stand for Samsung GALAXY Tab 10.1 Wi-Fi Only (Black)
